content.text: Match ends, Mallorca 1, Celta de Vigo 0.
Second Half ends, Mallorca 1, Celta de Vigo 0.
Augusto Fernández (Celta de Vigo) is shown the yellow card.
Giovani dos Santos (Mallorca) is shown the yellow card for excessive celebration.
Goal!  Mallorca 1, Celta de Vigo 0. Giovani dos Santos (Mallorca) right footed shot from very close range to the bottom right corner.
Attempt saved. Tomer Hemed (Mallorca) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Tomás Pina with a cross.
Natxo Insa (Celta de Vigo) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Geromel (Mallorca).
Offside, Celta de Vigo. Augusto Fernández tries a through ball, but Park Chu-Young is caught offside.
Danijel Pranjic (Celta de Vigo) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Javier Arizmendi (Mallorca).
Hand ball by Fabián Orellana (Celta de Vigo).
Attempt missed. Michael Pereira (Mallorca) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left following a corner.
Corner,  Mallorca. Conceded by Roberto Lago.
Substitution, Mallorca. Javier Arizmendi replaces Alejandro Alfaro.
Substitution, Celta de Vigo. Danijel Pranjic replaces Michael Krohn-Dehli.
Offside, Mallorca. Fernando Tissone tries a through ball, but Giovani dos Santos is caught offside.
Foul by Geromel (Mallorca).
Park Chu-Young (Celta de Vigo) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Offside, Mallorca. Alejandro Alfaro tries a through ball, but Michael Pereira is caught offside.
